00021     MainWindow::MainWindow(QWidget* parent)
00022         : QMainWindow(parent)
00023     {
00024         setupUi(this);
00025         m_logger = new Logger(this);
00026     
00027         /* center the window */
00028         QRect rect = QApplication::desktop()->availableGeometry(this);
00029         move(rect.center() - this->rect().center());
00030 
00031         m_hasImageLoaded = false;
00032         tabWidget->clear();
00033         tabWidget->addTab(new ImageWidget(tabWidget), QString("No image selected"));
00034 
00035         connectSignals();
00036     }

00038     MainWindow::~MainWindow()
00039     {
00040         delete(contextMenu);
00041         delete(m_logger);
00042     }

00044     void MainWindow::addImageTab(QPointer<Image> img)
00045     {
00046         closeTabByName(img->shortName());
00047 
00048         ImageWidget* w;
00049         if(!m_hasImageLoaded)
00050         {
00051             w = (ImageWidget*)tabWidget->currentWidget();
00052             w->setPixmap(*img);
00053             tabWidget->setTabText(tabWidget->currentIndex(), img->shortName());
00054         }
00055         else
00056         {
00057             w = new ImageWidget(tabWidget);
00058             w->setPixmap(*img);
00059             tabWidget->addTab(w, img->shortName());
00060         }
00061         w->setContextMenu(contextMenu);
00062         closeTabButton->setVisible(true);
00063         m_imageMap[img->shortName()]=img;
00064         setEnabledImageActions(true);
00065         m_hasImageLoaded = true;
00066         tabWidget->setCurrentIndex(tabWidget->count()-1);
00067     }
00068 
00069     void MainWindow::closeCurrentTab()
00070     {
00071 
00072         if(tabWidget->count()==1)
00073         {
00074             m_hasImageLoaded = false;
00075             setEnabledImageActions(false);
00076             closeTabButton->setVisible(false);
00077         }
00078         tabWidget->removeTab(tabWidget->currentIndex());
00079 
00080         if(!m_hasImageLoaded)
00081             tabWidget->addTab(new ImageWidget(tabWidget), "No image selected");
00082     }
00083 
00084     void MainWindow::closeTabByName(QString name)
00085     {
00086         if( !m_imageMap.contains(name) )
00087             return;
00088 
00089         int i =0;
00090         while(i<tabWidget->count())
00091         {
00092             if(tabWidget->tabText(i)==name)
00093             {
00094                 tabWidget->removeTab(i);
00095                 delete(m_imageMap[name]);
00096                 m_imageMap.remove(name);
00097                 return;
00098             }
00099             i++;
00100         }
00101     }

00104     {
00105         decodeButton->setEnabled(value);
00106         actionDecode->setEnabled(value);
00107         encodeButton->setEnabled(value);
00108         actionEncode->setEnabled(value);
00109         propertyButton->setEnabled(value);
00110         actionProperty->setEnabled(value);
00111         actionProperty->setEnabled(value);
00112         actionCloseCurrent->setEnabled(value);
00113         actionCopy->setEnabled(value);
00114     }

00116     void MainWindow::dragEnterEvent(QDragEnterEvent *event)
00117     {
00118         if (event->mimeData()->hasUrls())
00119             event->acceptProposedAction();
00120     }
00121 
00122     void MainWindow::dropEvent(QDropEvent *event)
00123     {
00124         if(event->mimeData()->hasUrls())
00125         {
00126             QList<QUrl> urls = event->mimeData()->urls();
00127             for(int i=0; i<urls.size(); i++)
00128             {
00129                 if(urls.at(i).toLocalFile().length()>0)
00130                     newImage(urls.at(i).toLocalFile());
00131             }
00132         }
00133         else
00134         {
00135             QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("SilentEye Warning"),
00136                                  "The dropped object doesn't have any url.");
00137         }
00138 
00139     }
00140 
00141     QPointer<Image> MainWindow::currentImage()
00142     {
00143         QString key = tabWidget->tabText(tabWidget->currentIndex());
00144         if(m_imageMap.contains(key))
00145             return m_imageMap[key];
00146         else
00147             return NULL;
00148     }
00149 
00150     void MainWindow::newImage(QString url)
00151     {
00152         if(QFile::exists(url))
00153         {
00154             QPointer<Image> img = new Image(url);
00155             if(img->isNull())
00156             {
00157                 QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("SilentEye Warning"),
00158                                      "Cannot load '" + url + "'\n file is not a valid image.");
00159                 return;
00160             }
00161             addImageTab(img);
00162         }
00163         else
00164             m_logger->warning("Cannot load '" + url + "'\n file doesn't exist !");
00165     }
00166 
00167     void MainWindow::openFile()
00168     {
00169         setCursor(Qt::WaitCursor);
00170         QFileDialog dialog(this, tr("Open Images"));
00171         dialog.setFilter(tr("Image Files (*.png *.jpg .jpeg *.bmp *.tiff)"));
00172         dialog.setViewMode(QFileDialog::List);
00173         dialog.setFileMode(QFileDialog::ExistingFiles);
00174         dialog.setDirectory(Controller::config.get("output"));
00175         if(dialog.exec())
00176         {
00177             QStringList fileNames = dialog.selectedFiles();
00178             for(int i=0; i<fileNames.size(); i++)
00179             {
00180                 newImage(fileNames.at(i));
00181             }
00182         }
00183         setCursor(Qt::ArrowCursor);
00184     }
00185 
00186     void MainWindow::paste()
00187     {
00188         const QClipboard *clipboard = QApplication::clipboard();
00189         const QMimeData *mimeData = clipboard->mimeData();
00190 
00191         if (mimeData->hasImage()) {
00192             QPointer<Image> img = new Image(qvariant_cast<QPixmap>(mimeData->imageData()));
00193             img->setShortName("pasted_image.img");
00194             addImageTab(img);
00195         } else {
00196             QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("SilentEye Warning"),
00197                                  "Cannot paste clipboard's data: not an image!");
00198         }
00199     }

00211             //clipboard->setMimeData(data, QClipboard::Clipboard);

00233     void MainWindow::connectSignals()
00234     {
00235         // Button actions
00236         connect(encodeButton, SIGNAL(pressed()), this, SLOT(execEncodeDialog()));
00237         connect(actionEncode, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(execEncodeDialog()));
00238         connect(propertyButton, SIGNAL(pressed()), this, SLOT(execPropertyDialog()));
00239         connect(actionProperty, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(execPropertyDialog()));
00240         connect(decodeButton, SIGNAL(pressed()), this, SLOT(execDecodeDialog()));
00241         connect(actionDecode, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(execDecodeDialog()));
00242 
00243         // Menu actions
00244         connect(actionOpen, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(openFile()));
00245         connect(actionCopy, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(copy()));
00246         connect(actionPaste, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(paste()));
00247         connect(actionCloseCurrent, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(closeCurrentTab()));
00248         connect(actionPreferences, SIGNAL(triggered()), &preferenceDialog, SLOT(exec()));
00249         connect(actionAbout, SIGNAL(triggered()), &aboutDialog, SLOT(exec()));
00250 
00251         // Others
00252         connect(&encodeDialog, SIGNAL(encodedImage(QString)), this, SLOT(newImage(QString)));
00253 
00254         contextMenu = new QMenu(this);
00255         contextMenu->addAction(actionCloseCurrent);
00256         contextMenu->addSeparator();
00257         contextMenu->addAction(actionEncode);
00258         contextMenu->addAction(actionDecode);
00259         contextMenu->addAction(actionProperty);
00260         contextMenu->addSeparator();
00261         contextMenu->addAction(actionCopy);
00262 
00263         // close tab button
00264         closeTabButton = new QPushButton(this);
00265         closeTabButton->setIcon(QIcon(":/menu/img/close.png"));
00266         closeTabButton->setFlat(true);
00267         tabWidget->setCornerWidget(closeTabButton);
00268         closeTabButton->setVisible(false);
00269         connect(closeTabButton, SIGNAL(pressed()), this, SLOT(closeCurrentTab()));
00270     }
